title: Bike Performance: Find your Hidden Limiters
description: The video discusses the importance of shifting focus from muscle training to improving oxygen utilization for cyclists. It highlights ...

transcript.full_text: if you're serious about improving your cycling performance it's time to shift your focus from your muscles to your oxygen utilization in fact 95 of physical cycling performance is based on oxygen distribution that's why a VO2 max which describes your ability to use oxygen is the most coveted metric in cycling your muscles are just one part of a complex system and finding and improving your oxygen limiters can be the most important way to make you faster are they Central like your lungs are hard or peripheral like your account of mitochondria or ATP by focusing on your oxygen utilization you can mold your training for better results identifying your limiters can be simpler than it sounds like subscribe
